But after we ended up losing our vcr they got sold

We had like at least 100 vhs movies

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546be72f6368726e17450000#post_546be72f6368726e17450000
Typewriters are fuggin sick. 
I don't know if it's my inner hipster or what but the sound and feeling of a typewriter clicking is so satisfying.

typewriters suck

its for grumpy old people and hipsters

and nobody likes both of these people

That would be awesome

topics.body:
what is with this strong dislike of myself?

you guys all talk like you could actually bear to be near a clone of yourself

where just thinking about talking to someone that acts JUST LIKE ME, makes me get...angry, like just being in the same room together is enough to bothe rme
